channel.title: Tender from AFD - IATI-related services (French)
channel.description:
I didn't see anything about this on Discuss so thought I'd share.
Agence française de développement (AFD) issued a tender for professional services for a "mise en conformité avec le standard IATI" (my rough translation: to align with the standard - presumably going up to 2.*). Deadline Nov 12. https://tenders-afd.dgmarket.com/tenders/np-notice.do?noticeId=24793664&full=f
Pls circulate in your networks, especially if you know people with relevant skills (including capacity to work in French) who are not on Discuss.
People should contact Delphine at AFD for more info (email available through the link).
